titleStmt.title: The grovnds and cavses of our sufferings related in short: who suffer by the cruelty of oppressors, in Edmonds-bury Goal in Suffolk.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
Harwood, John.
Fox, George, 1624-1691.
Rofe, George, d. 1664.
Marshall, Henry, fl. 1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Simonds, at the sign of the Bull and Mouth without Aldersgate.,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: From the servants of the Lord, who are sufferers as is declared in Bury Edmonds common Goal, &c. George VVhitehead, Iohn Harwood, George Fox, George Rofe, and Henry Marshall.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
